analysis: The project needs a Christmas-themed mobile-responsive UI update. The current files lack festive styling and mobile optimization. The index.html file should include a hamburger menu for mobile navigation, and the styles.css file needs Christmas-themed colors, fonts, and responsive design elements.

improvements.description: Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Implement Christmas-themed colors (reds, greens, golds) and fonts, and ensure responsive design for mobile devices.
